name: Jesse Koren
what_you_do: Sharla Jacobs co-founded Thrive Academy and has trained more than 150,000 coaches and holistic practitioners worldwide together with her husband and business partner Jesse Koren.
who_you_serve: Healers, coaches, and other holistic practitioners and heart-led business owners.
social_proof: Sharla Jacobs and Jesse Koren have been called "the #1 source for turning coaches and holistic practitioners into 6-figure transformational leaders" and "the leading authorities in holistic business training." Many of their students have achieved their first $10,000-month.
business_focus: Helping healers, coaches, and holistic practitioners grow their practices and attract more clients.
service_provided: Business training, marketing strategies, client attraction
